name: Transformers: Ultimate Battle Edition
summary: Transformers: Ultimate Battle Edition bundles together Transformers: Cybertron Adventures and Transformers: Dark of the Moon -- Stealth Force Edition. Set on Cybertron, the home planet of the robots in disguise, Transformers: Cybertron Adventures tells the origin story of both the Autobots and Decepticons. Rather than fighting as giant robots, Transformers: Dark of the Moon has users take control of Autobots and Decepticons in only their vehicle forms for car combat action.
